name: Magic Patterns
tagline: Design new features with AI
description: Create interactive designs, get user feedback, or deploy to your website. Magic Patterns is the AI design platform for product teams.

name: RunLLM
tagline: AI that doesn’t just respond—it resolves
description: Built on 10 years of UC Berkeley research, RunLLM reads logs, code and docs to resolve complex support issues. Saves 30%+ eng time, cuts MTTR by 50%, deflects up to 99% of tickets. Trusted by Databricks, Sourcegraph and Corelight—try for free on your product.

name: PodClips
tagline: Turn your podcasts into viral video content
description: PodClips helps you create all the video content needed to promote and grow your podcast. Shorts + Clips. You don’t need an agency, other tools, or anything else. Built from podcasters for podcasters. ✅ Viral Shorts ✅ Viral Clips ✅ Metadata for both

name: Jotform Gmail Agent
tagline: Automatically draft Gmail replies that sound just like you
description: Gmail Agent connects to your inbox and drafts replies using your tone, past emails, and company knowledge. It labels messages, skips ones that don’t need a response, and never sends without your approval, saving time and keeping you consistent.

name: SideNotes
tagline: Quick notes on screen edge
description: SideNotes is a quick-access notes app that lives on the side of your screen. Always available, even in full screen. Format text with Markdown (markup stays hidden), make task lists, customize with themes and lots of settings, sync via iCloud.

name: Wan 2.2
tagline: The first open MoE model for AI video generation
description: Wan 2.2 is a major open-source update to the Wan video models. It introduces a Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) architecture for top-tier performance and offers fine-grained cinematic control over lighting, color, and composition.

name: Notion-style editor for Tiptap Cloud
tagline: Collaborative block-based editor → ready to drop in your app
description: Many teams build Notion-like editors with Tiptap. We productized it. A React-based template in Tiptap Cloud with drag-and-drop blocks, real-time collab, AI writing, version history, embeds, dark mode, and more. Ready to plug and play for your app.

name: sndmyself
tagline: The simplest way to send yourself a message
description: Your personal thought-catcher. Send yourself reminders, notes, and ideas effortlessly. Keep your mind clear and your important thoughts organized

name: Lumo by Proton
tagline: Privacy-first AI assistant with confidential conversations
description: Meet Lumo, the zero-access encrypted AI assistant by Proton that does not track or record your conversations. Ask me anything — it's confidential. Lumo gives you the benefits of AI with top privacy and security. Free to start, no account required.

name: Layout.dev
tagline: Turn ideas into prototypes — in seconds
description: Layout is an AI-powered platform that helps founders and developers turn ideas into working software prototypes instantly. Just describe what you want to build, and Layout generates clean code, UI components, and project structure.

name: Edge Copilot Mode
tagline: Your AI-powered browser
description: Introducing Copilot Mode in Edge, our next step towards building a more powerful way to pilot the web.

name: Tern – Where Can Your Passport Take You?
tagline: Check travel access instantly, no guesswork.
description: Instantly check where your passport can take you. ✅ Get visa requirements - See if you can enter a country, with visa type, cost, docs and advisories. 🌍 See where you can go - Discover ranked destinations based on popularity, safety and visa accessibility.

name: Planby PRO
tagline: Build React Timeline today, fast and simple
description: Planby PRO is a React component for building complex timelines and schedules. Features include drag & drop (internal & external), timezones, multiple days, day ranges, vertical/horizontal views, fast virtual rendering, and easy 3rd-party integration.

name: FocusPit
tagline: Imagine if Notion and Discord had a child
description: Focuspit is a modular productivity app built around groups and widgets. Create shared dashboards to organize your life, work, home, or hobbies all in one place. If Notion or Todoist feel too much, you'll love how simple Focuspit is.

name: Immersity for Mobile
tagline: Immersity turns images into immersive videos instantly.
description: Immersity for mobile converts your photos into immersive video reels, making each moment feel within reach. Boost engagement, spike your likes, and impress your friends with social-ready reels and stories.

name: Tabby: AI Bookkeeper
tagline: Bookkeeping Done in Minutes, Not Hours, Powered by AI
description: Tabby is an AI-driven bookkeeping tool built for small businesses, solopreneurs, freelancers, and 1099 workers. Automate your expense tracking, categorize transactions, and generate tax-ready reports — all without hiring a bookkeeper.

name: LaraCopilot
tagline: The world's first Laravel AI Full Stack Engineer
description: LaraCopilot is the world’s first Laravel AI Full Stack Engineer. It turns your idea into a full stack Laravel app in minutes with clean code, database setup, migrations, admin panel, GitHub sync, and one-click deploy. No lock-in. Built 100% with Laravel.

name: Rize - Auto Time Tracking for Agencies
tagline: Rize is the world’s most advanced time tracker for agencies.
description: Rize is an AI-powered time tracker that automatically tracks your activity & tags entries to clients, projects, & tasks. Free your team from manual time tracking, gain real-time visibility into your team's work, & integrate seamlessly with your existing tools.

name: Open SaaS
tagline: The open-source SaaS boilerplate with superpowers!
description: Build and launch your SaaS application with our free, open-source, full-featured starter kit. Features include auth, payments, AI example app, and admin dashboard all built on top a modern UI using Shadcn.

name: Thread
tagline: You show up to sell. Thread handles the rest.
description: Thread is your single pane of glass to close more deals, faster. Prep, personalize, and follow up in seconds, so you spend more time with prospects, less on admin. Sellers save ~4 hrs/week to do more of what matters: close.

tagline: Design new features with AI
